Articles.Content:
In this challenge, you have to build a Balloon (Ludodyne or Hooligan Labs Plugin) and go to at least 12.000 m. Then you have to let at least one of the Crewmembers jump.

Rules:

This should be Manned.

You have to jump from higher than 12.000 m.

Screenshots:

- VAB

- Launch

- Maximal Altitude

- Kerbonaut on Capsule Ladder

- Jump

- Impact

Thank you and have Fun!
Unless there is also a plugin for EVA parachutes, or you do this on Jool, you will instantly die on impact...

Unless there is also a plugin for EVA parachutes, or you do this on Jool, you will instantly die on impact...

Kerbals have died for far less....
It does not count for this challenge, but redstar co op has an ejector seat for planes with a built in parachute. (But the kernel does not actually jump out)

<iframe class="imgur-album" width="100%" height="550" frameborder="0" src="http://imgur.com/a/YocrX/embed"></iframe>

Here ya go. I'm pretty sure Felix went supersonic too

fun things aside, balloons and ect would be a good addition
I was about to do it, when the game crashed T_T
If you do it on Eve, you gonna survive the jump.

Unless there is also a plugin for EVA parachutes, or you do this on Jool, you will instantly die on impact...

Not true, I jumped from 37 km from a rocket and I survive after a bounce or two but I did RCS thrust downward the whole time. I swore I took screenshots but sadly I must of hit F2 or something. I can try to replicate it but it be a rocket instead of a balloon.

EDIT: Did it from the balloon uploading gallery now

There is bug where the space kraken saves kerbals from potentially death-causing aldeals.
